Item.name: ORCA Coalition Lightvest
Item.description: A lightweight armor which offers slightly above-average resistances without impeding mobility.

Item.name: ORCA Phaethon Lightvest
Item.description: A lightweight armor which offers slightly above-average resistances without impeding mobility. Trades protection for mobility.

Item.name: ORCA Phaethon Heavy Vest
Item.description: A heavy, but rather protective vest to go along with the rrR-series undersuits.

Item.name: ORCA Coalition Heavy Vest
Item.description: A heavy, but very protective vest to go along with the Horizons series undersuits.

Item.name: ORCA Horizons Undersuit MK1-PP0
Item.description: A simple lightweight undersuit for diving operations. Its protection is modest but it does not impede the wearer either. This suit was created as a part of early trials, and while it does not offer pressure resistance, it does complement a diving suit quite well.

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Upper Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Upper Arm

Item.name: ORCA Phaethon Undersuit rrR-#1-PP0
Item.description: A simple lightweight undersuit for diving operations. Its protection is modest but it does not impede the wearer either. Phaethon variant loses some protection in favor of flow and stun resistance and added movement speed. The undersuit fits within a diving suit quite well, increasing swimming speed.

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Upper Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Upper Arm

Item.name: ORCA Horizons Undersuit X-AMCP MK2-PP4K
Item.description: Mark 2 of the advanced Horizons undersuit. As long as a battery is inserted, it generates an experimental HORIZON field that keeps the wearer safe from pressure up to 4000 meters. Its thick layers grant a great deal of protection but also slow the wearer considerably.

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Lower Arm

Item.name: ORCA Phaethon Undersuit rrR-#2-PP4K
Item.description: Version 2 of the rrR-series pressurized undersuits. When powered, it pressurizes the wearer and protects them against up to 4,000m of pressure. More agile than its HORIZON counterpart and protects better against inhuman hazards.

Sprite.name: Heavy ORCA Suit, Dark Orange (Rank Special)

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Lower Arm

Item.name: ORCA Phaethon Undersuit rrR-#3-PP6K
Item.description: Version 2 of the rrR-series pressurized undersuit. Its pressurization technology is more efficient and the suit provides more protection than its predecessor.

Sprite.name: Heavy ORCA Suit, Dark Orange (Rank Special)

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Lower Arm

Item.name: ORCA Horizons Undersuit X-AMCP MK3-PP6K
Item.description: Mark 3 of the advanced Horizons undersuit. The technology within has been further streamlined and advanced with the aid of alien technology and its pressurization has been especially advanced at the cost of radiation advancement.

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Lower Arm

Item.name: ORCA Phaethon Undersuit rrR-#4-PP10K
Item.description: The pinnacle of rrR-series suits, the rrR4 pressure suit grants the wearer excellent environmental protection without sacrificing mobility. It can run off fuel rods instead of batteries and provides a significant mobility boost.

Sprite.name: Heavy ORCA Suit, Dark Orange (Rank Special)

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Lower Arm

Item.name: ORCA Horizons Undersuit X-AMCP MK4-PP10K
Item.description: The zenith of Horizons technology. The Mark 4 suit grants complete pressure protection and excellent physical defenses and uses fuel rods and mobility assist to counteract its heavy weight. It boasts more fuel life and physical protection over the Phaethon version.

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 2 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 2 Left Lower Arm
